statements: SELECT * FROM loan_applications;
SELECT application_id, customer_id, loan_amount FROM loan_applications WHERE approval_status = 'approved';
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount, application_date FROM loan_applications WHERE loan_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM loan_applications WHERE application_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT customer_id, application_date, approval_status FROM loan_applications ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM loan_applications WHERE approval_status = 'pending';
SELECT application_id, customer_id, loan_amount FROM loan_applications WHERE application_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM loan_applications WHERE loan_amount >= 10000 ORDER BY application_date DESC;
SELECT application_id, customer_id, loan_amount, application_date FROM loan_applications WHERE approval_status = 'approved' LIMIT 3 OFFSET 2;
SELECT approval_status, COUNT(*) FROM loan_applications GROUP BY approval_status HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications LIMIT 5;
SELECT application_id, customer_id, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE approval_status = 'PENDING';
SELECT approval_id, application_id, approval_date, approved_amount FROM LoanApprovals WHERE approved_amount >= 5000;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications ORDER BY application_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(loan_amount) AS total_loan_amount FROM LoanApplications GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications ORDER BY application_date DESC, loan_amount ASC;
SELECT application_id, customer_id, loan_amount, application_date FROM LoanApplications WHERE approval_status = 'pending';
SELECT application_id, customer_id, loan_amount, application_date, approval_status FROM LoanApplications WHERE loan_amount > 5000;

SELECT la.application_id, la.customer_id, la.loan_amount, la.application_date, la.approval_status, laa.approval_date, laa.approved_amount FROM LoanApplications AS la JOIN LoanApprovals AS laa ON la.application_id = laa.application_id;

SELECT la.application_id, la.customer_id, la.loan_amount, laa.approved_amount FROM LoanApplications AS la LEFT JOIN LoanApprovals AS laa ON la.application_id = laa.application_id WHERE laa.approved_amount IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM loan_applications;
SELECT application_id, customer_id, loan_amount FROM loan_applications WHERE status='approved';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT application_id, application_date, status FROM loan_applications WHERE loan_amount > 50000;
SELECT approval_id, application_id, approved_amount, approved_by FROM loan_approvals ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM loan_applications;
SELECT application_id, customer_id, loan_amount FROM loan_applications WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT application_id, customer_id, loan_amount, application_date FROM loan_applications WHERE loan_amount > 10000;
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM customer_profiles WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE id IN (2, 3);
SELECT id, amount, status FROM loan_applications WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT customer_id, MAX(amount) AS max_amount FROM loan_applications GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT e.name, e.department, a.approval_date FROM employees e JOIN approvals a ON e.id = a.employee_id ORDER BY a.approval_date DESC;
SELECT id, customer_id, amount, status FROM loan_applications WHERE status='pending';
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT id, name, email FROM customers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM approvals JOIN employees ON approvals.employee_id = employees.id WHERE employees.department='Finance';
SELECT application_id, approval_date, remarks FROM approvals WHERE approval_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications;
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount FROM LoanApplications WHERE application_status = 'Pending';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Approvals WHERE approval_status = 'Approved' ORDER BY approval_date DESC;
SELECT document_type, description FROM Documents WHERE document_type = 'Income Proof';
SELECT * FROM LoanApplications WHERE application_status = 'Pending';
SELECT customer_id, loan_amount, application_status FROM LoanApplications ORDER BY loan_amount DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, a.application_status FROM Customers c INNER JOIN LoanApplications a ON c.customer_id = a.customer_id WHERE a.loan_amount > 50000;
SELECT d.document_type, d.description, c.first_name FROM Documents d INNER JOIN Customers c ON d.document_id = c.customer_id WHERE d.document_type = 'Identification';
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, p.employment_status FROM Customers c INNER JOIN PersonalDetails p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.annual_income > 75000;
